entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
